body:
I'm trying to set up the Bitcoin Core v20.1.
I'm using VM Workstation 16 with Ubuntu. I succeeded to configure en compile (make), but when I run "make check", I get an error regarding qt.
Underneath, I share the log-file.
Anybody any idea on the cause of this. Could it be because I'm working on a virtual machine?


=============================================

=============================================

title: make check failure
